items.sentence: My sister can't start the day without reading her horoscope.
Tom would never have said something like that to a customer.
This has been happening off and on for the past three years.
I don't think that I could spend three hours alone with Tom.
I don't think Tom knows what time Mary is planning to leave.
I don't think Tom knows how much milk Mary drinks every day.
Perhaps you could suggest something that we can do tomorrow.
It makes no difference to me whether we go by car or by bus.
Tom ducked under the railing and stepped out into the alley.
Tom looked at the white sandy beach and swaying palm fronds.
